dmca.title: Jeweler Calls "Fake" on Copied Text and Images
dmca.body:
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text and images that appear on the following pages:
a.	http://www.bernardine.com/birthstone/opal.htm

b.	http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/peridot.htm

c.	http://www.bernardine.com/www.bernardine.com/gemstones/sapphire.htm

d.	http://www.bernardine.com/www.bernardine.com/birthstone/opal.htm

e.	http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/citrine.htm

f.	http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/topaz.htm

g.	http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/aquamarine.htm

h.	http://www.bernardine.com/birthstone/emerald.htm

2.
a.	Search Query: "Copal, is also a tree resin but it hasn't fully Infringing Web Page: http://www.jkschmidtca/opal.htm

b.	Search Query: "and is mentioned in the Bible under the name of Chrysolite Infringing Web Page: http://www.jkschmidt.ca/peridot.htm

c.	Search Query: "spiritual enlightenment and inner peace. Sapphire is believed Infringing Web Page: http://www.jkschmidt.ca/sapphire.htm

d.	Search Query: "s There are two distinct types of Opal, common and precious. http://www.jkschmidt.ca/opal.htm

e.	Search Query: "Almost all Citrine that is available on the market today is heat-treated amethyst httpl/www.jkschmidt.ca/citrine.htm

f.	Search Query: "the suggested anniversary gemstone for the 4th, 19th or 23rd year of marriage http://www.jkschmidt.ca/topaz.htm

g.	Search Query: "Some gemstones are heated to high temperatures to enhance the http://www.jkschmidt.ca/aquamarine.htm

h.	Search Query: "Emeralds were used as amulets to ward off epilepsy in children www.jkschmidt.ca/emerald.htm

3.	Contact: copyright@bernardine.com.

4.	Contact information for infringing webpage: Phone : 250-768-7353
5.1 have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not
 
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry 
http://www.bernardine.com
